channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI completes its for-profit recapitalization
item.description: OpenAI has completed its recapitalization, splitting the AI lab into a for-profit corporation nested inside a non-profit foundation.

item.title: Amazon to cut 14,000 corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon said on Tuesday that it plans to reduce its corporate workforce by 14,000 jobs as it seeks to reduce bureaucracy, remove layers and invest more...

item.title: Netflix CTO announces interactive real-time voting for live content
item.description: While watching live content, viewers will be able to vote to directly influence the outcome of what they're watching on their TV or mobile device.

item.title: Charter Space brings fintech to spacecraft insurance and is showing off its stuff at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: The goal is faster, cheaper, and more reliable risk evaluation for spacecraft insurance, and eventually to power new forms of credit and nondilutive f...

item.title: Apple and Microsoft are now both worth more than $4T
item.description: This is the first time Apple's market capitalization has crossed the $4 trillion mark, making it the third company to ever cross the milestone after N...

item.title: Netflix CTO says more vertical video experiments are coming, but streamer is not competing with TikTok
item.description: Netflix CTO Elizabeth Stone says company is experimenting with vertical video, but isn't trying to be TikTok.

item.title: 4 Best Music Streaming Services (2025): Spotify, Apple Music, and More Compared
item.description: Plunge into the stream with the best apps to discover music, share it among friends, and rock out.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Day 2
item.description: Second day of TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 at San Francisco's Moscone West. Here's the rundown to what to expect, including the 50% discount on passes for ...

item.title: Netflix launches redesigned profiles for kids
item.description: Netflix announces new Kids' profiles with real-time recommendations, a 'My Netflix' hub, and more.

item.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI will have a ‘legitimate AI researcher’ by 2028
item.description: To achieve those goals, OpenAI is betting on two key strategies: continued algorithmic innovation and dramatically scaling up "test time compute" — es...
